TDAT:   public boolean addJar(String path){
    File file = new File(path);
    if (!file.exists()){
      return false;
    }
    try {
      URL jar = new URL("jar:file:" + file.getAbsolutePath() + "!/");
      addURL(jar);
    }
    catch (MalformedURLException e) {
      // TODO Auto-generated catch block
      e.printStackTrace();
      return false;
    }
    return true;
  }

COM:adds a JAR file to the classpath
